articles.author: Echo Wang
articles.description: Customers of Arm Holdings Ltd including Apple Inc (AAPL.O), Nvidia Corp (NVDA.O), Alphabet Inc (GOOGL.O) and Advanced Micro Devices Inc (AMD.O) are set to invest in the chip designer's initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.
articles.title: Exclusive: Arm signs up big tech firms for IPO at $50 bln-$55 bln valuation-sources

articles.author: David Randall
articles.description: Signs of rising consumer stress are prompting some fund managers to grow more conservative in their outlooks, even as the broad stock market continues to rally.
articles.title: Wall St Week Ahead Investors lower outlook for consumers as student loans, credit card debts pile up

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Disney (DIS.N) and Charter Communications (CHTR.O) traded salvos over their unresolved distribution agreement after channels like ESPN went dark on Thursday for customers of Charter's Spectrum cable service.
articles.title: Disney, Charter rates dispute spills over to TVs as ESPN, ABC go dark

articles.author: Manya Saini, Hannah Lang
articles.description: Robinhood (HOOD.O) said on Friday it had entered into a share repurchase agreement with the United States Marshal Service (USMS) for $605.7 million to buy back stock from Sam Bankman-Fried's Emergent Fidelity Technologies.
articles.title: Robinhood to buy back Bankman-Fried's stake from US govt for $605.7 million

articles.author: Kailyn Rhone
articles.description: See-through backpacks and jean shorts are among the popular last-minute purchases ahead of the new school year, several retailers said, as heat waves sweep the U.S. and security concerns grow at many middle- and high schools.
articles.title: Back-to-school US spending set to hit record high in 2023

articles.author: Amina Niasse
articles.description: Black Americans were the only U.S. racial or ethnic group to see a drop in their jobless rate in August, helping drive the gap between the rates for Black people and white people back to near a record low.
articles.title: Jobless rate for Black Americans drops as others rise

articles.author: Ziyi Tang, Clare Jim, Yu Xie
articles.description: China stepped up measures to boost the country's faltering economy on Friday, with top banks paving the way for further cuts in lending rates and sources saying Beijing plans further action including relaxing home-purchase restrictions.
articles.title: China ramps up economic support as Country Garden vote looms

articles.author: Yu Xie
articles.description: Embattled Chinese property developer Country Garden (2007.HK) has won approval from creditors to extend payments for a 3.9 billion yuan ($540 million) onshore private bond, two people familiar with the matter said on Saturday.
articles.title: Chinese developer Country Garden wins approval to extend onshore bond - sources

articles.author: Mike Stone
articles.description: The Biden administration will for the first time send controversial armor-piercing munitions containing depleted uranium to Ukraine, according to a document seen by Reuters and separately confirmed by two U.S. officials.
articles.title: Exclusive: US to send controversial depleted-uranium munitions to Ukraine -sources

articles.author: Hyunsu Yim
articles.description: North Korea fired several cruise missiles towards the Yellow Sea in the early hours of Saturday, according to the South Korean military.
articles.title: North Korea fires several cruise missiles towards sea, says South Korean military
